name: MindManager XML Map Template
summary: Learn about .XMMAT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You can save mind maps as templates when you want to re-produce mind maps with similar content and style. The XMMAT templates are especially helpful when creating a mind map, so you do not have to start from scratch.

While most MindManager users save templates as binary MMAT files, the XMMAT format is more transportable since it utilizes the widely-supported XML standard. However, XMMAT files are typically larger than their MMAT counterparts.
NOTE: Corel Corporation acquired MindManager from Mindjet in 2016.

instructions: You can open an XMMAT file with Corel MindManager in Windows and macOS. To open an XMMAT file, select File â†’ Open....
